author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were feared to have drowned when their coracle capsized here in a lake on Sunday.

According to police, the incident occurred when the victims Babu (28), an auto driver, and Regan alias Rajashekar (26), along with three other friends went on a joy ride at the dargah lake. Police said they were caught in a whirlpool. A few locals jumped into the lake and rescued Lakshmipathy, Santosh, and Balamurugan. However, Babu and Regan were missing.

Fire and Rescue Service personnel were carrying out a search operation in the lake.
title: Two feared drowned in lake
